attributes.title: Working Women - All Around The World
attributes.description:
Created on March 3, 2011 by ETPahs on Sourcemap.org:

this is a sourcemap to show the whereabouts of women and young girls working in bad conditions all around the world. we are the Ethical Trade Project -http://ethicaltradeproject.org/  -, and we are promoting ethical trade for teenagers and children all around the world. Our job is to make it really easy for kids and teenagers to understand what ethical trade is. Our section of the project is women and girls, and we decided to make a sourcemap to show where all the badly treated women and girls are around the world and also inspirational women who were in poverty. Also we are showing how we can make it fairer for them, and how we are making the world more ethical for women. As a group of teenagers ourselves, we beleive everyone should know about ethical trade, women and girls and of course out project, are about. | Made in Aylesbury, Buckinghamshire, UK
